HS.Description: Description: Prior to beginning a regular period of extended sleep (this would exclude naps). Note that this might occur at different times of day depending on a person's regular sleep schedule.

WAKE.Description: Description: Upon waking up from a regular period of sleep, in order to start regular activities (this would exclude waking up from a nap or temporarily waking up during a period of sleep)

ACM.Description: before breakfast (from lat. ante cibus matutinus)

ACD.Description: before lunch (from lat. ante cibus diurnus)

ACV.Description: before dinner (from lat. ante cibus vespertinus)

PCM.Description: after breakfast (from lat. post cibus matutinus)

PCD.Description: after lunch (from lat. post cibus diurnus)

PCV.Description: after dinner (from lat. post cibus vespertinus)
